Los Angeles Eats

In January ‘22, I’ll be heading out west to USC. Living in Los Angeles has been on my list of dreams for many years now. Just a few months ago, I didn’t know this dream would become my reality so soon!

I visited my sister in LA in 2018 (I wrote a recap here), and I always say it was one of the happiest weekends of my life. While I don’t expect every day to exactly mirror that weekend, it just makes me optimistic about my future there 😊

I have no clue where the next few years will take me, but I do know what I want to prioritize in the future:

  1. Highlighting the stories behind foods
  2. Learning the history behind a variety of cuisines
  3. Expanding my palate
  4. Discovering how different fusion cuisines came to be
  5. Connecting with small businesses
  6. Being able to empathize with a more diverse group of people

Can’t wait to see you soon, LA!
